Official Speedrun.com Legal:
 Original content provided on the site is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International. Content uploaded by users, such as game cover images, are copyright of their respective owners; the same applies to content that is linked to, like YouTube videos and external images or documents.
 
 Apps whose core functionality is directly related to the site may use the domain name (speedrun.com) in their name, as long as it's not the sole name, and the app adheres to the license applicable to the content it uses. Either the app name or the description must explicitly state that the app is unofficial.

Runs will appear here as you watch them.

Ever since I started writing this app, I have always wanted to do more with the data this app interacts with. This release includes the introduction of charts-a major step in accomplishing this goal.
 
 Here are the charts to look for:
 * World record progression, as seen on speedrun.com. Includes the ability to view as part of a list and view the videos for all the runs!
 * Submission volume-for all of the above :)
 * Player's "favorite" games based on PB submissions
 * All time runs submitted to the site (also as seen on speedrun.com)
 
 Coming soon:
 * Player PBs chart
 * Biggest improvers and new contenders for the WR in a game/category
 * Longest world record holders
 This is just the beginning. I plan to continue adding new charts regularly as they come to mind/are suggested.
 
 It has been really great to see this project grow. Thanks for all the support!
No players to show! Type into the search box to find a player by name.
Select categories/levels you want to receive notifications for new records. Choose "Select None" to unsubscribe.

I do my best to track, monitor, and resolve crashes and other app misbehavior as are observable via analytics. However, I have had a lot of difficulty resolving some issues reported on the Play Store because I have not been able to open a line of communication or receive more specific details of the issue.
 
 In order to try and remedy this, I recommend sending an email with an attached screenshot and details about your session so I can debug with greatest efficiency.
 
 You are of course welcome to post a poor review on the play store. I read feedback from there as well! I just will have a harder time resolving such issues.
 
 If you do choose to send an email, the process would be made most easy if you did the following:
 
 * Submit Screenshots of issues and pages around the issue, when applicable
 * Provide a detailed overview of your session, including which games, players, and runs you may have viewed
Number of runs submitted in a time period. A potential signal of new skips or popularity level.
Tap on a list item while selected to view the run!\n \n Game completion time by world records over time. Plotted by each subcategory on the same line.

Plots all leaderboard runs on a single chart.
This chart gives a wholistic view on what a "typical" skilled time might look like what separates the seasoned runners from newbies.
The number of PBs this player has submitted for each game, displayed as a Pie wheel.
The number of verified runs recorded on the site over time.
